baseQuery: ("adverse effect" OR iatrogenic OR "unintended consequence" OR "long term outcome")
query: (("adverse effect" OR iatrogenic OR "unintended consequence" OR "long term outcome")) AND (Animals[MeSH Terms] OR "Veterinary Medicine"[MeSH Terms] OR "Animal Diseases"[MeSH Terms] OR animal[Title/Abstract] OR veterinary[Title/Abstract] OR "animal health"[Title/Abstract] OR "one health"[Title/Abstract])
